name: poseidon-group

procedures: T1003::[Poseidon Group] conducts credential dumping on victims, with a focus on obtaining credentials belonging to domain and database servers.
T1007::After compromising a victim, [Poseidon Group] discovers all running services.
T1036.005::[Poseidon Group] tools attempt to spoof anti-virus processes as a means of self-defense.
T1049::[Poseidon Group] obtains and saves information about victim network interfaces and addresses.
T1057::After compromising a victim, [Poseidon Group] lists all running processes.
T1059.001::The [Poseidon Group]'s Information Gathering Tool (IGT) includes PowerShell components.
T1087.001::[Poseidon Group] searches for administrator accounts on both the local victim machine and the network.
T1087.002::[Poseidon Group] searches for administrator accounts on both the local victim machine and the network.

description: [Poseidon Group](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0033) is a Portuguese-speaking threat group that has been active since at least 2005. The group has a history of using information exfiltrated from victims to blackmail victim companies into contracting the [Poseidon Group](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0033) as a security firm. (Citation: Kaspersky Poseidon Group)
